An '''ink sac''' is an [[item]] dropped by a [[squid]] upon death used to create [[black dye]], [[dark prismarine]],{{only|BE|short=1}} as well as [[books and quills]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Mob loot ===
{{see also|Tutorial:Squid farming}}

{{Drop sources|Ink Sac}}

=== Generated loot ===
{{LootChestItem|ink-sac}}

=== Fishing ===
A stack of 10 ink sacs can be obtained as a "junk" item from [[fishing]]. Ink sacs are the rarest fishing loot, with a {{frac|1|1000}} chance of obtaining them from fishing with an unenchanted [[fishing rod]]. The [[Luck of the Sea]] enchantment decreases the chances of obtaining ink sacs.

=== Trading ===
[[Wandering trader]]s can sell 3 ink sacs for an [[emerald]] {{in|bedrock}}.{{verify|Was it changed to sell black dye instead to match Java Edition?}}

=== Compound creation ===
Ink sac can be created from its base [[element]]s, using the [[compound creator]].{{Only|bedrock|education}}

=== Signs ===
Ink sacs can be applied to [[sign]]s or [[hanging sign]]s to revert glowing text back to default.
